[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@holoflows/kit](./kit.md) &gt; [getEnvironment](./kit.getenvironment.md)

## getEnvironment() function

Get the current running environment

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getEnvironment(): Environment;
```
**Returns:**

[Environment](./kit.environment.md)

## Remarks

You can use the global variable `__holoflows_kit_get_environment_debug__` to overwrite the return value if the current hostname is localhost or 127.0.0.1
